summary:
I am a problem solver with a strong focus on realizing the best outcome possible. To accomplish this, I deconstruct challenges, rely on my analytical capabilities and cooperate with my team. I have a strong drive to challenge myself and help develop my team to constantly improve.

I have enjoyed positions in various industries such as IT, Telecommunication, Brand activation, Events, Government, Finance, Education and not-for-profit. My professional experiences have taught me the following about myself:

I can successfully design, optimize and implement key processes.
- Fully understand the client or the end user’s needs
- Enjoy doing research, analyse data and explore different solutions

I thrive in a creative and collaborative environment.
- I love to challenge and bring out the best in myself and my team
- I have a strong interest in using the newest technologies to achieve personal and business goals

Professional Skills:
Project Management I Process Optimization I Strategic Planning I Recruitment Cycle I Research & Data Analytics

When I’m not working, I’m improving my photography, videography and editing skills, searching and mixing new music, brushing up my HTML and CSS skills or you can find me running, hiking and camping in one of the national parks.  

I enjoy meeting new people and hearing new perspectives so please feel free to reach out.

school.name: HU University of Applied Sciences Utrecht (Hogeschool Utrecht)

profile_positions.description: Define, prepare, coordinate and execute technical implementation in line with the clients business needs and within project methods and techniques and internal team process agreements. Maintaining strong relationships with clients such as Menzis, bol.com and Vitens whilst managing expectations throughout the entire process.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for the end-to-end recruitment of marketing, IT, sales and retail positions.
- Researching, designing and implementing our Covid-19 business policy.
- Sourcing potential candidates through online channels.
- Assess candidate information, including resumes using Team Tailor (ATS).
- Conduct phone and behavioural interviews to determine successful candidates.
- Conduct background checks and track recruitment results for reporting during weekly and
monthly meetings.
- Continuous process improvements of the recruitment process and ATS system.
- Payroll processing in Zambion (HRIS).

Achievements:
Successfully managed up to 30 requisitions simultaneously with 27 candidate placements in various
roles over the course of one month. Next to my recruitment activities, I developed an end-to-end
recruitment guideline whilst implementing process improvements. During lockdown I successfully
designed and implemented our Covid-19 return to office policy.
profile_positions.title: Talent Acquisition Advisor

profile_positions.description:
- Writing my thesis on the quality of the strategic workforce for two business units.
- Research and data analysis at a strategic level and provide improvement initiatives to
management.
- Support on the development of an organization wide employee engagement survey.
- Completing a second research during and after graduating on the quality of Career
Management at Rijkswaterstaat.
- Supporting an organization wide Employee Engagement Survey.

Achievements:
I successfully completed my thesis autonomously within the set timeframe and presented the
outcomes to the direction of the two business units involved. My short-term advice on the strategic
workforce planning has been implemented within the organisation. To challenge myself I completed
a second research on career management simultaneously.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Officer

profile_positions.description:
- Coordinating teams of up to 12 employees during music and corporate events.
- Brand activation for brands such as Samsung, Heineken, Lipton, Bulleit, America Today.
- Utilise my leadership and goal setting skills to set and meet targets.
- Brief and debrief each activation by team- and self-reflection to ensure continuous
improvement.
- Work close with partners and other stakeholders to achieve desired outcomes.
- Proactively identify and resolve issues.

Achievements:
Successfully managing teams up 12 by utilising my leadership skills. Brief and provide training to
team members to make sure targets are achieved.
profile_positions.title: Operational Team Lead

profile_positions.description:
- Responsible for managing the entire recruitment process of new IT interns at Capgemini.
- Successfully gauged and set client requirements, sourcing, screening and submitting
resumes, interview process, selection, signing contracts and agreement and follow up.
- Maintaining relationship with internal and external stakeholders.
-  Utilizing SuccessFactors to keep track of (potential) candidates.
- Supporting of the employer branding campaign by creating employer branding content.
- Keeping track of the progress of the candidates in SuccessFactors.

Achievements:
Over the course of my internship I have managed ten outstanding IT roles simultaneously. The
number of interns at the company increased from 30 to 70 over the course of my internship period.
profile_positions.title: HR Recruitment Intern
